thread.title: Germany school gunman: Police swoop to reports of armed man in Menden | Daily Star
thread.title_full: Germany school gunman: Police swoop to reports of armed man in Menden | Daily Star

author: Henry Holloway
title: Germany school gunman: Police swoop to reports of armed man in Menden | Daily Star
text:
“This is the state of the investigation” Dietmar Boronowski 
SWAT choppers and armoured police officers descended on the Hönne-Berufskolleg in Menden to reports of an active shooter. 
Dramatic photos from the scene showed heavily armed officers taped off the school as they searched for a gunman. 
Students and teachers were ordered to lock themselves in their classrooms after the alarm was trigger. 
But officiers closed down the operation after it was revealed to be a false alarm. 
TWITTER MENDEN: Cops swooped on the school in Germany 
TWITTER MENDEN: Helicopters swept on reports of a gunman 
Ambulances were sent to the scene amid fears of a terror attack as Europe remains on-edge following a string of ISIS terror attacks in 2016 . 
Students took to Facebook to describe the scenes and snapped pictures out of the windows of gun-wielding police descending on the school. 
There were no injuries during the incident and the local government of Arnsberg confirmed it was a false alarm on Twitter. 
TWITTER ARMED POLICE: Menden's vocational school was shutdown 
The alarm was first triggered at 11.15am local time this morning. 
Dietmar Boronowski, police chief commissioner, said special forces continue to investigate what triggered the school alarm. 
He said: "We have no dead, no injured, and no evidence of an amoctate. The search for special forces continues. This is the state of the investigation.” Berlin pays tribute to those dead in the Christmas market terror attack Tuesday, 20th December 2016 Berlin pays tribute to those who were affected by the terror attack at a Christmas market 1 / 9 Getty Images German Chancellor Angela Merkel arrives to lay flowers near where yesterday a lorry ploughed through a Christmas market on December 20, 2016 in Berlin, Germany Related videos
